layout.subject: Fund Transfer Completed Successfully
layout.body:
Hi {{ user.name }},

The Fund transfer to {{ target_user.name }}({{ target_user.email }}) was successful completed.

The Transfer Details are;

Transfer Id : {{ transfer.id }}
Amount : {{ transfer.amount }}
To : {{ target_user.name }} ({{ target_user.email }})
date : {{ transfer.date_created }}

If Your are not the one who initiated the process, Kindly contact administrator for a reversal.

Thank You
